text:
<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Hello world [/INST]" 
A: qo vIvan </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Good morning [/INST]" 
A: Maj Po </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: What is your name? [/INST]" 
A: nuq oH ponglIj e </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: How old are you? [/INST]" 
A: ben ar bIbogh </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: What day of week is today? [/INST]" 
A: DaHjaj pujwI pu </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: What time is it? [/INST]" 
A: arlogh Qoylu pu </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Can you speak English? [/INST]" 
A: DIvI Hol DajatlhlaH a </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Where is the bathroom? [/INST]" 
A: nuqDaq oH puchpa e </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Why is the sky blue? [/INST]" 
A: qatlh chegh </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: I want to learn Klingon [/INST]" 
A: tlhIngan Hol vIghoj vIneH </s>

<s>[INST] Q: "Translate English to Klingon: Nice to meet you [/INST]" 
A: qaghom e vItIv </s>
